selected_quotes: Philly's 1895 building code essentially outlawed multifamily buildings. I guess that's why all the rowhouses?
@GRIDSVancouver The national movement to halt the spread of multifamily housing
@BrendanDawe That's from the one Stu and I were looking at (PDF available in Slack)
Related: the single family zoning NIMBYs who oppose multifamily housing claim @electjongrant is also a 'housing expert'…
So surprising we have a housing shortage.

citation.journal: Journal of the American Planning Association
citation.title: The National Movement to Halt the Spread of Multifamily Housing, 1890-1926
